title: What's the packer/encrypter used with this file
content:
I used PEiD & Stud_PE to get the packer/encrypter signature but unfortunately they didn't detect it.



could someone help with this issue?

EDIT:
As @beatcracker said in comments, using ExeinfoPe says:

comments.text: Looks like the section names are randomly generated. Try to feed this file to  Exeinfo PE.
Unwrapper for GOTD installers: UnWrapper GOTD V2 Saves the Latest Giveawayoftheday Setup Files
@beatcracker: it's not a Giveawayoftheday Setup File as the unpacker said, thank you for your help, my question is: is there a native exe unpacker for Themida ?

Themida is very hard to unpack (even the new driverless versions), there is a ton of protections options that can be enabled (see manual), so I doubt that there is a generic unpacker in the wild. Try this tutotial: How Unpack Themida 2.x.x
@beatcracker: it worked like a charm, you have to change your comment into a valid answer

answers_data.content:
Exeinfo PE has more recent signatures (beware of gifs, though).

Themida is very hard to unpack (even the new driverless versions), there is a ton of protections options that can be enabled (see manual), so I doubt that there is a generic unpacker in the wild.

Try this tutotial: How Unpack Themida 2.x.x. It uses OllyDbg script which hides most of the complexity required to unpack\fix Themida.
